concept.title: 30.000 Scope of part.

conbody.p: This part describes policies and procedures for applying the Cost Accounting Standards Board (CASB) rules and regulations ( 48 CFR Chapter 99 (FAR Appendix)) to negotiated contracts and subcontracts. This part does not apply to sealed bid contracts or to any contract with a small business concern (see 48 CFR9903.201-1(b) (FARAppendix) for these and other exemptions).
